whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
paragraphs: Lesar Consults is a premier data, research and analytics consultancy firm dedicated to transforming health systems across East Africa and beyond through evidence-based solutions and innovative approaches.
We specialize in health systems strengthening, financial analysis, monitoring and evaluation, and research surveys that drive meaningful impact in communities we serve.
Our multidisciplinary team combines deep technical expertise with local knowledge to deliver solutions that are both globally informed and contextually relevant.

Since our establishment, we have partnered with leading international organizations, government agencies, and development partners to advance health outcomes and economic development across the region.
